segments.text: You look so excited . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are not going to believe this . Do you remember the dress we saw at Mayors that was so beautiful and expensive ? I got it today at half price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So they have started the year end sale earlier this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can you stay so calm ? Aren't you going to take a look to see if there is anything for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I'll wait a few more days . There maybe even bigger discount then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there won't be anything good left .
segments.speaker: S2
